title.narrative: Senegal: Export development of IT and IT-enabled services (NTF IV)

description.narrative: The purpose of the Netherlands Trust Fund Programme IV (NTF IV) in Senegal is to support the internationalisation of the local IT/ITES SMEs and startups through: strategic, inter-ministerial coordination, an IT and ITES export-development strategy, and positioning of Senegal on the global IT and ITES market; the strengthening of OPTIC, the sector association, as a provider of export advisory and training benefiting its current and future members; the capacity building of companies in export marketing planning and sales; mobilizing the Senegalese network of foreign trade representatives (FTR) to promote IT and ITES trade opportunities to complement the work done in the area of investment promotion; and the development of new markets jointly with Senegal’s main TPO, ASEPEX, and OPTIC, using an approach already applied under NTF III in Bangladesh, Kenya and Uganda.

participating-org.narrative: Agence sénégalaise de promotion des exportations (ASEPEX), Senegal
Centre for the Promotion of Imports from Developing Countries, Netherlands
Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands, Netherlands
Organisation des Professionnels des Technologies de l'Information et de la Communication, Senegal

mailing-address.narrative: International Trade Centre (ITC) Palais des Nations 1211 Geneva 10 Switzerland
